metadata.Title: CVE-2022-43272 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
DCMTK v3.6.7 was discovered to contain a memory leak via the T_ASC_Association object.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-43272` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dcmtk - 3.6.6-5ubuntu0.1~esm1
libdcmtk16 - 3.6.6-5ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: dcmtk package in esm-apps/jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6.6-5ubuntu0.1~esm1').
